comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: According to en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cape_Cod_Canal , the canal opened for limited use in 1914 and was completed in 1916. Judging from NYT of April 22, 1914, query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=990DEFD8163AE633A... the "joining" took place on April 21, 1914 The "opening exercises" took place on July 29. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9901E1DB1438EF32A...
